import React from 'react'; import { coverUrl, openLibraryUrl } from '../api/openLibrary'; export default function BookDetailsModal({ book, onClose }){ return (

{book.title}

{book.cover_i ? :
No cover
}

Author(s): {(book.author_name || []).join(', ')}

First published: {book.first_publish_year || '—'}

Edition count: {book.edition_count || '—'}

Subjects: {(book.subject || []).slice(0,6).join(', ') || '—'}

Open on OpenLibrary
); }
